```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(collapse = TRUE, message = FALSE)

library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)

```

### Interactive Map 2016

```{r}
nypd_2016 = read_csv("Data_preprocessing/data/cleaned_NYPD_2016.csv")
```


```{r}
NYPD_plot = 
  nypd_2016 %>%
  filter(
    offense %in% c("BURGLARY", "FELONY ASSAULT", "GRAND LARCENY", "GRAND LARCENY OF MOTOR VEHICLE", "MURDER", "RAPE", "ROBBERY")
  ) %>%
  plot_ly(
    lat = ~latitude,
    lon = ~longitude,
    type = "scattermapbox",
    mode = "markers",
    alpha = 0.2,
    color = ~ borough) %>%
  layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = "carto-positron",
      zoom = 9,
      center = list(lon = -73.9, lat = 40.7)
    )
  )
  
NYPD_plot  
```
